text: Boats in Venice (also known as Barche a Venezia) is a 20th-century late impressionist painting in oil by Umberto Boccioni. It was painted about 1890, in Venice, Italy. The work inspired the painting Boat in Venice by Umberto Boccioni. == Other websites == * Boat in Venice * Boats in Venice (Filippini) * Francesco Filippini * Umberto Boccioni Category:Paintings by Umberto Boccioni Category:1910s paintings
title: Boat in Venice (Boccioni)
